info.name: Movie Ticket Booking API
info.description: API documentation for the Movie Ticket Booking System

request.description: Retrieve details of a specific user using their ID.
Update details of an existing user.
Remove a user from the system.
Retrieve a list of all registered users.
Register a new user in the system.
Allows a user to change the seat for a booked ticket.
Retrieve details of a booked ticket using its ID.
Cancel a booked ticket using its ID.
Book a ticket for a given showtime and user.
Retrieve all tickets booked by a specific user.
Retrieve a list of all booked tickets.
Retrieve details of a specific theater by its ID.
Modify an existing theater's details using its ID.
Remove a theater from the system using its ID.
Retrieve a list of all available theaters.
Add a new theater to the system.
Retrieve details of a specific showtime by its ID.
Modify the details of an existing showtime.
Remove a showtime from the schedule.
Retrieve only the halls where a given movie is currently being shown.
Retrieve a list of all scheduled showtimes.
Schedule a new movie showtime in a specific hall.
Retrieve details of a specific movie by its ID.
Modify an existing movie's details using its ID.
Remove a movie from the system using its ID.
Retrieve a list of all available movies.
Add a new movie to the system.
Retrieve details of a specific hall by its ID.
